name: Grande Ventures
overview: Grande Ventures, LLC is a venture capital firm committed to the transformation of ideas into successful enterprises. We partner with entrepreneurs, as well as other venture firms, to develop and implement strategies to overcome the challenges to successful entry into the marketplace. We are invested with our entrepreneurs and share in the fortunes of the business. We support our companies by providing expertise across a wide range of technology areas and business functions as we work to convert our entrepreneur’s vision and passion into a successful enterprise.

funding_round.source_description: Mitrionics Secures $6M in VC Funding to Expand International Operations and Product Development
